\section*{Country XX1 and YY1"}
Change1 - KK

```{r}
data_sect1 <- read_csv("C:/Users/kkabu/OneDrive/Documents/Tutorial8/Data/worldwidecases.csv")
```

Filtering GER and FRA
```{r table}
tab1 <- data_sect1 %>% filter(countriesAndTerritories %in% c("Germany", "France"))

head(tab1)
```

Plotting
```{r plot}
plot1 <- tab1 %>% filter(month %in% c(4,5)) %>% ggplot(aes(x = day, y = deaths, color = countriesAndTerritories)) + geom_line() + facet_wrap(~month)
plot1 + ggtitle("France and Germany Deaths Per Day for April and May")
```
